posts.post_content:
Low grade lot of 5 T213-2's: Ames (Cincy), Byrne, Hummel Brooklyn), Lennox, Oldring (Philadelphia Amer.)

The bad news is that these cards have succumbed to the fate of many type 2 Coupons, with their glossy surface disintegrating: 

[IMG]http://s9.postimg.org/u6435ik4f/20160207_102136.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://s9.postimg.org/spskndh7j/20160207_102201.jpg[/IMG]

The good news is that, 
in 1914 you could buy 20 Coupon Cigarettes for 5 cents;
now you can buy 5 Coupon cards for $20 bucks! Shipped!

PM with questions.  Thanks for looking!
